text: Donald Anthony Perkins (March 4, 1938 - June 9, 2022) was an American football fullback in the National Football League. He played for the Dallas Cowboys from 1961 until 1968. He played college football at the University of New Mexico. Perkins died on June 9, 2022 in Albuquerque, New Mexico at the age of 84.Ring of Honor Member Don Perkins Passes Away ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American football fullbacks Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Football players from Iowa Category:People from Waterloo, Iowa
title: Don Perkins
